results.title: Simvastatin Significantly Reduced Alcohol-Induced Cardiac Damage in Adolescent Mice
results.text_hl: ...@<m>DISEASE_Alcoholism</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D000437 @@@Alcohol abuse@@@ by adolescents is becoming a serious health concern as they often progress to becoming @<m>DISEASE_Alcoholism</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D000437 @@@alcoholics@@@ later in life which may lead to @DISEASE_Heart_Diseases @DISEASE_MESH:D006331 @@@heart problems@@@.

results.title: Simvastatin is associated with reduced risk of acute pancreatitis: findings from a regional integrated healthcare system.
results.text_hl: @SPECIES_9606 @@@Patients@@@ that received @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@ were more likely to have @DISEASE_Gallstones @DISEASE_MESH:D042882 @@@gallstone-related disorders@@@, @<m>DISEASE_Alcoholism</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D000437 @@@alcohol dependence@@@ or hypertriglyceridaemia compared with the reference population.

citations.NLM: Wu BU, Pandol SJ, Liu IL. Simvastatin is associated with reduced risk of acute pancreatitis: findings from a regional integrated healthcare system. Gut. 2015 Jan;64(1):133-8. PMID: 24742713
